previousProjects.title: Neon Rush Obby
previousProjects.description: **Neon Rush Obby** is a fast-paced and visually stunning Roblox game that challenges players to race through a vibrant world filled with glowing neon colors, tricky parkour jumps, and moving platforms. Set in a futuristic city of lights, the game combines speed, agility, and precision as players navigate through multiple obstacle courses that test their reflexes and timing. Each level becomes more challenging with creative traps, disappearing paths, and glowing lasers that make every run exciting. The upbeat electronic music and colorful atmosphere create an adrenaline-filled experience that keeps players hooked. Whether you’re playing solo or competing with friends, *Neon Rush Obby* offers a thrilling adventure full of energy and style.

currentProject.title: Indigenious Tech Ecosystem Of India
currentProject.description: It is a website about India’s indigenous technology ecosystem is rapidly emerging as one of the most dynamic and self-reliant in the world. Rooted in the vision of Atmanirbhar Bharat (self-reliant India), it focuses on developing homegrown innovations across sectors like information technology, defense, space research, renewable energy, and biotechnology. Indian startups and research institutions are driving breakthroughs in artificial intelligence, semiconductors, digital payments, and sustainable technologies, reducing dependence on foreign solutions. Organizations such as ISRO, DRDO, and C-DAC, along with private players and startups, are strengthening India’s technological foundation. This growing ecosystem not only supports economic growth but also empowers local talent, promotes innovation, and enhances national security—making India a global hub for indigenous technological advancement.
